name: Panda Baby Natural Baby Oil
description: This natural and mild baby oil is rich in nourishing vitamin E, and caring natural oils of organic virgin coconut oil, sweet almond oil, sesame oil, olive oil and sunflower seed oil. Together this nurturing combination moisturizes, softens and cares for baby’s delicate skin, protecting it from dryness. Its unique comforting aroma leaves skin lovingly scented, perfect for the softest cuddles. Great for baby massage and parent-baby bonding. Also ideal for use on hair. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
